assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no conflicts of interest with industry or firms commercializing genetic tests. No industry or corporate sponsors contributed to the development of these recommendations. SFMPP is not funded by industrial or commercial companies but by grants from public institutions and partially self-funded by SFMPP annual congresses. Dr. Pujol discloses attending Advisory Board Membership meetings for AstraZeneca, Pfizer, and Genomic Health.
